data.prayer: Father, help 909 new simple churches start among the 4,545,900 people in the state of Ilocos Sur, Philippines. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ilocos Sur, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 4,545,900 souls living in the state of Ilocos Sur with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Ilocos Sur you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Ilocos Sur do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Negrito, Mamanwa people. Make the Negrito, Mamanwa people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
the state of Ilocos Sur has (about) 633,235 people who know Jesus, 3,501,957 people who know about him culturally, and 410,708 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Ilocos Sur to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ilocos Sur, Philippines has a population of 4,545,900.

We estimate Ilocos Sur has 633,235 people who might know Jesus, 3,501,957 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 410,708 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Ilocos Sur, Philippines so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
